edu.nyu.cs.cs101.consumers

Class ExpandableBall

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.nyu.cs.cs101.consumers.GeometricObject
      • edu.nyu.cs.cs101.consumers.Ball
        • edu.nyu.cs.cs101.consumers.ExpandableBall
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Colorable, Drawable, Expandable, Movable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConsumingBall, EvadingBall, IntelligentBall

    public class ExpandableBall
extends Ball
implements Expandable
    An ExpandableBall is a ball that implements the Expandable interface. Expandable objects can grow() or shrink() in size.
    Author:
    Andrew Case
